description:
We are recruiting a Material Handler Forklift to join our team! Your position will focus on safe and efficient movement of products and materials. You will assist with the day-to-day activities of Shipping and Receiving with loading/unloading, quality verification and data entry.

Monday through Friday

Hours:7:30am to 4:00pm

Responsibilities:

  • RF scanning experience
  • ERP system experience
  • Sit down forklift experience
  • Load, unload, and stage products and materials
  • Track and record units of materials handled
  • Must be able to sit, stand, lift weights up to 50lbs and bend throughout the workday
  • Adhere to safety policies and procedures

Qualifications:

  • Experience in all of the above responsibilities
  • Ability to handle physical workload
  • Strong work ethic
  • High School Diploma or GED
  • Must pass a background check, drug test and E-Verify

Company Description

Founded by veterans of the staffing industry, StaffingForce is a recognized leader in the staffing industry, serving customers ranging from the Fortune 500 to medium-sized businesses and entrepreneurial start-ups.

We provide full-time and temporary specialized staffing services regardless of occupation, industry, or location.
